definition: lit. a nail is a nail and a rivet is a rivet (idiom)/fig. meticulous/conscientious/unambiguous
pinyin: ding1 shi4 ding1 , mao3 shi4 mao3

definition: nail/to follow closely/to keep at sb (to do sth)/variant of 盯[ding1]
to join things together by fixing them in place at one or more points/to nail/to pin/to staple/to sew on

to join things together by fixing them in place at one or more points/to nail/to pin/to staple/to sew on
to fasten with rivets/(coll.) to exert one's strength
